short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Quebec, QC by March 1, 2023.
description: This NPP is issued \\_pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category(ies) of the SA:\_\- Product Category 6 \u2013 Support space furniture.}\_
full_summary:
**Notice of Intent: Office Furniture (Product Category 6)**

**Notice Title:**
Product Category 6 – Support Space Furniture

**Notice Reference Number:**
PW-22-01008673

**Publication Date:**
September 28, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:**
October 14, 2022, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)

**Contracting Entity:**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Notice Summary:**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure office furniture (Product Category 6 – Support Space Furniture) in accordance with the Canadian government's procurement policies and procedures.

**Background and Objectives:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to support its operations in Quebec, QC, by March 1, 2023. The contract will be awarded through a competitive, selective tendering process.

**Eligibility:**

The following trade agreements will be taken into consideration during the evaluation process:
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Evaluation and Award:**

The evaluation process will be based on the supplier's ability to meet the government's requirements, and the award will be made to the lowest-priced compliant bidder who meets the government's requirements.

**Appendix:**

Please find the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents in both English and French, attached to this notice.

Notice URL: None

Attachment URL (English): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/7da9bfbf16446deb5591454b52197895/30003447_-_ws_annex_e_standard_rfb_en_final.pdf>

Attachment URL (French): <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/364f6774cdf47981d5603263051e5ee5/30003447_-_ws_annexe_e_-_standard_fr_final.pdf>

Please direct any questions and submissions to:

Marius Lacasse
Email: marius.lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
Phone: None
Fax: None
Address: 200 Kent St, Ottawa, ON K
